title: Frame QA Inspection

elements.name: Section Heading
elements.label: General

elements.name: Number Input
elements.label: Job Number

elements.name: Full Name
elements.label: Site Managers Name:

elements.name: Address
elements.label: Site Address:

elements.name: Date Time
elements.label: Date Time

elements.name: Section Heading
elements.label: OHS FRAME INSPECTION
elements.instruction: Please complete the following questions to ensure site is prepared safe for further works

elements.name: Yes/No
elements.label: Is the Site Sign filled in correctly and readable?
elements.actionMessage: If not, please complete asap and supply new photo.

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of Site Sign

elements.name: Yes/No
elements.label: Is the slab backfilled Completed? Ensuring there is no large steps down from slab or tripping hazards?
elements.actionMessage: Please book asap to be completed

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of back fill. Min 4 photos, one from each side

elements.name: Yes/No
elements.label: Is there a Cage or Bin on site for rubbish?
elements.actionMessage: Please organise a Cage or bin to be dropped off asap

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of Bin

elements.name: Yes/No
elements.label: Is the house swept or blown out on completion of frame?
elements.actionMessage: Contact framer to return and complete

elements.name: Yes/No
elements.label: Is the metre box installed and secure?  If power is connected, is the metre box tagged?

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of inside of metre box.

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all timber temp bracing removed including blocks off floor with all timber stacked neatly with nails removed or bent over?

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of timber neatly stacked

elements.name: Section Heading
elements.label: SLAB AND WALL INSPECTION
elements.instruction:
Please complete the following questions. 
DO NOT SPRAY PAINT FINAL FINISHED CONCRETE

elements.name: Yes/No
elements.label: Yes/No

elements.name: Number Input
elements.label: Does the overall height of walls match the plan? Please enter height below

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are room dimensions correct?

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are walls Plumb with in 3mm over 2m ? If out, spray arrow to location with label OOP (Out of Plumb)

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of location of OOP with room name

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Do bottom plate fully site on the slab? Spray any over hang more than 10mm  that may need repair. Refer to engineering plan to repair detail.

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Supply photo of location of overhang and a photo with tape/ruler showing over hang amount.

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Long Text

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are Shower/ Ensuite concrete step downs correct for room size and depth.

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of each Ens/ bathroom or shower with step down

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are the bottom plates secure correctly to slab? Nails spaced no more than 900mm away from each other. Dyna Bolts installed as per engineering report. Ensure all little nibs are secure

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Spray location and take photo.

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all Windows and External door frames installed Level, Plumb, correct height and Orientation. Windows should be Packed and installed with 70mm 2.8mm gal nails or 8g screws.

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Do all doors have DPC flashing installed under before insulation?

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of DPC Installed

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Is the Sliding door tracks and door treads level with slab ready for Vinyl install?

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of door bottoms

elements.name: Yes/No
elements.label: Are all wall noggins installed and nailed securely?

elements.name: Yes/No
elements.label: Are all door ways cut out? eg material removed along the bottom of opening

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all Internal door openings correct size, height and width?  Mark orientation on slab. Width and height should be 60mm more then size of door. eg 920 door is a 980 opening.

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all Cavity sliding openings correct orientation , with openings double the door size plus 60 and plus 100 to door height?

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photos of incorrect Door / Cavity sliding openings

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all Bulkheads installed as per plan? Check level and size

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all external wall junctions shot off with Min 6 Nails?

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Has ply brace been installed as per plan? Nailed 50mm spacing top and bottom, 100mm sides and 200mm through the middle of sheet?

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are Double studs installed under each Girder truss?

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of Double studs

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are required Post installed and connected to beams with Min 2 bolts into each beam and into slab with post stirrup and dyna bolts?

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of Post Installed.

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Spray paint notes of important items such as Shower Niche and shaving cabinets on floor to inform trades of locations.

elements.name: Section Heading
elements.label: TRUSS INSPECTION
elements.instruction:
Inspection is based on a timber frame and may differ when completing for steel. 
ATTACHED LINK TO HELP WITH TRUSS INSPECTION https://pryda.com.au/wp-content/uploads/Pryda-Roof-Truss-Installation-Guide.pdf

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of truss layout

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all trusses installed as per truss layout?

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all trusses installed as per truss layout?

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are trusses plumb within reason? 30mm over 2m

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all tie downs completed as per truss layout?

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all Plaster nogs above walls and for change of direction installed and flush with bottom?  Nogs above walls to be max every 600mm and change of direction should be every bay.

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are L Brackets installed max every 1800 or middle of walls? L Bracket nails into noggin or truss should centre of grooves and not nailed down to allow for movement.  A quick test would be shake the wall looking for minimal movement. Double check nib walls like fridge space for completion.

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Image Upload

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are Man hole Nogs installed? Please note nogs are to stick down the thickness of plaster batten if plaster battens are being installed. Spray location of manhole on floor.

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photos of Shear Blocks

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are Box gutters installed as per plan? Non treated timber on base with adequate fall and up stand?

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Location and photo of man hole

elements.name: Section Heading
elements.label: PLUMBING INSPECTION

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Long Text

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Image Upload

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Long Text

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Image Upload

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are plumbing pipes for vanities and sinks  in their correct location? Inside the wall cavity where required?

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are plumbing pipes for vanities and sinks  in their correct location? Inside the wall cavity where required?

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of each toilet pipe location

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all toilet pipes in correct location? As per measurements on slab plan and product details?

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of floor wastes

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are floor waste installed in correct location for showers or general use in the room?

elements.name: Long Text
elements.label: Are all storm water rises installed as per plan, capped and showing no damage? Make sure each down pipe has a riser as well as fire access point and any strip drains .

elements.name: Section Heading
elements.label: PHOTO RECORDS
elements.instruction: Please supply clear, wide photos of frame for record keeping. if using a iPhone Zoom out showing more of the site.

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of site from across the road - min 2 photos

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of nature strip and footpath - min 3 photos

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of frame from all 4 corners of project - min 4 photos

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of internals - min 6 photos

elements.name: Image Upload
elements.label: Photo of any defect not captured above.

description: Please complete inspection before surveyor attends and payment to framer is made. Complete one QA per dwelling to help record information and save time walking around.
